forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 67, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 7 to 13 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 55. Southwest wind 7 to 12 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

weather_report:
A crisp clarity envelops Downtown San Francisco this morning, as intermittent sunlight dances across the skyline, casting warm shades against the backdrop of the bay. The temperature holds close to the late 60s, a gentle embrace amidst a light breeze from the west-southwest, the air imbued with a hint of oceanic freshness. The absence of the frequent morning fog suggests a day that invites exploration; yet, as afternoon descends, expect a subtle cooling, a soft reminder of the marine layer that lingers just beyond the horizon.

For those stepping out, layering becomes a simple choice—consider a light jacket that can be easily shed, while comfortable footwear may be the key for spontaneous strolls through the city’s vibrant streets. With the day progressing, a pause at a local café may yield the perfect opportunity to savor a warm beverage while absorbing the gentle bustle of life around you. As the sun softly declines, embracing the atmosphere of this picturesque urban haven may be the most delightful way to navigate the hours ahead.
